Package tables

Class Table

  • Object
    • RestaurantData
      • Table
  • public class Table
extends RestaurantData
    Table entity class

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) class  Table.Reservation
      Reservation entity attached to the table.

    • Field Detail

      • capacity

        private int capacity
        Capacity of the table.

      • occupied

        private boolean occupied
        Occupancy status of the table.

      • reserved

        private boolean reserved
        Reservation status of the table for the current restaurant session.

      • order

        private Order order
        Order attached to the table. May be null.

      • reservationMap

        private Map<String,​Table.Reservation> reservationMap
        Maps a session to a reservation. Each session should have only one reservation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Table

        Table​(int tableId,
      int capacity)
        Creates a new table with mostly default parameters.
        Parameters:
        tableId - ID of the table - usually related to the capacity of the table (capacity + table index). Passed into the parent class.
        capacity - Capacity of the table

      • Table

        Table​(int tableId,
      int capacity,
      boolean occupied,
      boolean reserved,
      Order order)
        Creates a new table with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        tableId - ID of the table - usually related to the capacity of the table (capacity + table index). Passed into the parent class.
        capacity - Capacity of the table
        occupied - Occupancy status of the table
        reserved - Reservation status of the table for the current restaurant session.
        order - Order attached to the table. May be null.

        Removes all reservations that are expired.

      • addReservation

        boolean addReservation​(int contact,
                       String name,
                       LocalDateTime date,
                       int pax)
        Adds a reservation to the reservation map with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        contact - Contact number of the person making the reservation.
        name - Name of the person making the reservation.
        date - Date/time of reservation.
        pax - No. of pax to reserve for.
        Returns:
        True if successful, else False.

      • deleteReservation

        void deleteReservation​(Table.Reservation r)
        Removes the specified reservation from the reservation map by obtaining the session from that reservation.
        Parameters:
        r - Reservation to be removed.

      • findReservationsByContact

        List<Table.Reservation> findReservationsByContact​(int contact)
        Search for reservations under the specified contact.
        Parameters:
        contact - Contact number to check against.
        Returns:
        List of reservations found.
